Desc.entry: A registered charity which aims to help young people aged under 16 years who have run away from home or are thinking of doing so. Gives help and advice on options and mediates between parties if required. Provides emergency accommodation when no other solution can be found. Self referral.

ContactName.entry: Tracy Haycox, Strategic Runaway Services Director/Mark Smith, Operations Manager

category.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE - WELFARE AND SOCIAL INCLUSION
